last_episode_to_air.name: Due Dates & An Engagement Getaway!
last_episode_to_air.overview: Whitney and Josie dish about motherhood and work on a craft project for their nurseries. Meanwhile, Nathan tells Lawson that he’s hoping to propose to Esther!

name: Bringing Up Bates
overview: Twenty-seven years ago Gil and Kelly Jo Bates tied the knot with no plans to have kids. Fast forward 19 kids later and this tight-knit family, seemingly too good to be true, has a tremendous bond but are far from perfect. As you will see, when you have a house full of 19 children, from ages two to 25, daily chaos is multiplied exponentially, but so are the joyful and poignant moments that life can bring.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: UP Faith & Family presents Bringing Up Bates. Gil and Kelly Bates, and their 19 kids, are buzzing about the latest addition to their family; the first Bates grandchild!

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: UP presents Bringing Up Bates. Gil and Kelly Bates, and their 19 kids, are buzzing about the latest addition to their family; the first Bates grandchild!

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: Bringing Up Bates is a reality series following Gil and Kelly Jo Bates, and their 19 kids, as they experience lifeâ€™s every day challenges and joys as a supersized family with an upcoming wedding, potential courtships and maybe even another baby on the way!

seasons.name: Season 4
seasons.overview: Bringing Up Bates is back, and buckle up because it will be one roller coaster of a summer! Change is in the air as a lot of the kids are beginning to forge their own paths outside of the family. From new loves, to new careers and new babies, the Bates are growing up and experiencing both the highs and lows of life.

seasons.name: Season 5
seasons.overview: It’s a time of “New Beginnings” for the Bates family as the entire crew takes on new and exciting challenges. Zach and Whitney are adjusting to life as parents of two, Erin and Chad are adjusting to a new baby and puppy, and Lawson launches his own concert tour. Meanwhile, Alyssa has exciting news to share and Tori sees her relationship with Bobby evolve into something more serious.

seasons.name: Season 6
seasons.overview: How do parents with 19 kids aged 2 to 25 handle daily challenges? And how will the family change when grandkids are added to the mix!?

seasons.name: Season 7
seasons.overview: How do parents with 19 kids aged 2 to 25 handle daily challenges? And how will the family change when grandkids are added to the mix!?

seasons.name: Season 8
seasons.overview: When Gil and Kelly Jo Bates married in 1987, they didn't plan to parent 19 children. Ranging from toddler to 20-something, living under one roof, challenges abound, even for this tight-knit family.

seasons.name: Season 9
seasons.overview: How do parents with 19 kids aged 2 to 25 handle daily challenges? And how will the family change when grandkids are added to the mix!?

seasons.name: Season 10
seasons.overview: The married couples continue to grow their families, and Katie and Travis may be headed for a big step. But this season is not just about the girls… will a Bates boy finally be headed to the altar?

episodes.name: Meet the Bates
episodes.overview: The Bates' first grandchild causes much excitement for everyone and prompts the girls to plan a baby shower in the series premiere of this reality show spotlighting a family with 19 children living in rural Tennessee.

episodes.name: Courtship & Marriage
episodes.overview: Erin has sleepover with her siblings so that she doesn't feel so lonely in her house where just she and her husband live; Zach and Whitney prepare for parenthood; and Michaella and her chaperone surprise her boyfriend with a visit to Texas.

episodes.name: Bates Go Wild
episodes.overview: The whole Bates clan packs up and heads to the great outdoors! If you think packing for your family is hard... try packing for 21!

episodes.name: Training up Bates
episodes.overview: Disciplining kids is never easy, but by now, Gil and Kelly have it down to a science with a method they call “Train Up.” Plus Chad and Erin head to the doctors where they are expecting a baby.

episodes.name: Nashville Son
episodes.overview: Gil, Kelly and the younger kids plant a fall garden. With so many opinions to juggle, deciding on its location, let alone what to plant, is difficult. Meanwhile, budding gospel country singer and songwriter Lawson heads to Nashville to effort his dream of a music career. With one published CD under his belt, he lands a meeting with a record label executive and gets a coveted session with a well-known vocal coach. Back at the Bates house, the garden finally gets planted with Chad’s help and the family eagerly awaits news from Lawson in Nashville.

episodes.name: Organized Chaos
episodes.overview: How does a family of 21 find enough clothes to last through the winter? Get ready for the Bates seasonal clothing switchover, where nothing goes to waste! In the midst of the chaos, the family is asked to sing at a bluegrass music festival... but can they all learn their parts in time?

episodes.name: Welcome Grandbaby Bates
episodes.overview: Zach and Whitney's baby is due in less than 2 weeks, but the nursery is nowhere near ready! Lucky for them, there are plenty of Bates to lend a hand. As Whitney's due-date nears (and passes!) the whole family gets anxious to meet the newest addition to the ever-growing clan. Later, Erin shares surprising news with her parents.

episodes.name: The Purity Ring
episodes.overview: Carlin gets a night out alone with her parents and they have a special surprise for her. Later, the Bates family visits Zach and Whitney as they adjust to being first-time parents. Then, Lawson sings the National Anthem in front of 15,000 people.

episodes.name: Brandon and Michaella
episodes.overview: Brandon comes for an extended stay. Could his visit could mean bigger things for Michaella and him?

episodes.name: A Big Bates Thanksgiving
episodes.overview: Get ready to give thanks... Bates style! The whole family heads to Gil's parents' farm for a super-sized family dinner. The family joins hands to say what they're thankful for. Someone reveals a surprise.

episodes.name: The Bates go to Florida
episodes.overview: The family heads to Florida to visit John and Alyssa.

episodes.name: All About the Bates
episodes.overview: Find out everything you want to know (and then some!) about the Bates as they answer viewer questions and show some hilarious never-before-seen footage.

episodes.name: A Birthday to Remember
episodes.overview: Gil is turning 50 and the kids want to surprise him with a huge party! Kelly Jo whisks Gil away for a romantic overnight stay while the kids get to work planning the festivities. When the big surprise is revealed, a teary-eyed Gil basks in the warm glow of being surrounded by so many family and friends.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: UP Faith & Family presents Bringing Up Bates. Gil and Kelly Bates, and their 19 kids, are buzzing about the latest addition to their family; the first Bates grandchild!

episodes.name: All Together Again
episodes.overview: In the season 2 premiere, the family celebrates their special tradition, ‘I Love You Day,’ with surprise gifts (and surprise guests) for the whole family. Gil and Kelly Jo host a special ‘game night’ just for the couples and everyone joins together to prepare for Alyssa’s baby shower!

episodes.name: Future in Laws?
episodes.overview: Gil, Kelly Jo and Michael head to Chicago to see Brandon’s parents. Brandon corners Gil for a ‘heart to heart’ talk in the most unlikely of places! Meanwhile, back in Tennessee, Erin and the kids rush to redecorate their parent’s bedroom before Gil and Kelly Jo get back.

episodes.name: High Risks, High Hopes
episodes.overview: Erin and Chad meet with Dr. Vick to discuss the risk of having a stillbirth and the precautions they must take for the rest of her pregnancy. Later, the couple invites Zach, Whitney and baby Bradley over for dinner while the older boys square off against the younger ones in a giant Airsoft battle!

episodes.name: Movin' in with Meema
episodes.overview: Gil and Kelly Jo take Trace and Josie to the orthodontist to get braces, and Gil reveals how he can afford orthodontia for so many kids. Later, Kelly Jo’s mother Meema announces that she wants to live closer to the kids. So Kelly Jo takes her house hunting, but the task proves tougher than anyone could have imagined.

episodes.name: Blessings... and New Beginnings?
episodes.overview: With Erin and Chad’s due date looming, the whole family gathers for their baby shower. Erin’s friend Kelsey comes for the occasion and helps put together a sentimental surprise that leaves Erin speechless. Nathan and Lawson’s friends from New York, Ashley and Anastasia, also visit and the kids have fun showing these city folk a real country adventure!

episodes.name: Brandon Pops the Question
episodes.overview: The Bates celebrate two joyous occasions in a special episode! First, Gil and Kelly Jo fly to Florida to see Alyssa and John and welcome their new granddaughter, Allie Jane, to the world. Then, a few days later, they’re off to Washington, DC, where Brandon plans to propose to Michael using an elaborate scavenger hunt that will have her trekking all over the city!

episodes.name: Doctor's Orders
episodes.overview: Erin has been experiencing early contractions, so she and Chad rush to their doctor, to find out what’s wrong. Meanwhile, Michael and Brandon discover how stressful it can be to plan a wedding long distance via video chat.

episodes.name: Life Lessons
episodes.overview: The family takes us inside the rewards and challenges of homeschooling so many kids, each with a different learning style. Kelly talks candidly about her daughter Addee’s hearing disability and we get a glimpse into the special relationship between Addee and her sister Ellie. Then Gil leads the boys through a hard-core PE class!

episodes.name: The Wedding To-Do List
episodes.overview: Michael and Brandon meet with a wedding planner to go over all the details of their upcoming nuptials. Meanwhile, Chad comes up with a clever plan to make some extra money before the baby arrives.

episodes.name: Erin's Little Miracle
episodes.overview: Erin and Chad have their final appointment with Dr. Vick and anxiously await the arrival of their baby. Since the delivery is a high-risk procedure, the family is on pins and needles, hoping and praying that all goes well.

episodes.name: Boating with the Bates
episodes.overview: It’s time for the annual family lake trip! The kids waste no time jumping into the lake, swimming, boating and skiing! But what starts out as a perfect day soon turns to disaster when thunder strikes and the family has to head for the hills!

episodes.name: The Quest for the Dress
episodes.overview: Michael takes Kelly Jo and her sisters into town to look for a wedding dress. But after hours and hours of searching, she gives up. None of the dresses are right. The wedding is only 2 months away and Michael is starting to get nervous!

episodes.name: Addee & Ellie's Pool Party!
episodes.overview: When you have 19 kids, it’s hard to spend one-on-one time with any of them. But it’s not impossible. Kelly makes a point to spend the day with Trace, while Gil and Josie take off for a father/daughter adventure. Afterward, the whole family gathers together as Addee and Ellie celebrate their birthdays with a joint swim party!

episodes.name: Best Bates Memories
episodes.overview: In this one hour special we meet the lucky winner of the ‘Be the 20th Bates’ contest and highlight their day with the Bates family! We’ll also be counting down the very best moments of the past year and get an exclusive look at the upcoming season.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: UP presents Bringing Up Bates. Gil and Kelly Bates, and their 19 kids, are buzzing about the latest addition to their family; the first Bates grandchild!

episodes.name: Welcome Back Bates
episodes.overview: The past year has been one of enormous change and growth for the Bates. In the Season 3 premiere, the Bates clan rallies together to help Michaella finally find the wedding dress of her dreams. Later the family braves a stormy outdoor wedding for Kelly Jo's sister, and celebrates Gil's dad, Papa Bill, with an awesome 4th of July birthday party!

episodes.name: Sweet Tea & Sit Ups
episodes.overview: With Michaella's wedding quickly approaching, Kelly Jo and Gil wager to see who can get in shape to look their best for the big day. While Kelly Jo enlists Tori to motivate her and help with workouts, Gil finds his coach, Lawson, uses a more hands off approach to whip him into shape.

episodes.name: 15 Kids and an Empty Nest
episodes.overview: With the big wedding just days away the family is busier than ever. Gil and Kelly take the kids to the park for some rollerblading and playground exploring. Erin hosts a laughter filled candle making party for Michaella and her bridesmaids. Nathan, Lawson, and Trace take Brandon on an outing to the skating rink, but an accident on the ice could put the wedding in jeopardy.

episodes.name: Wedding Bliss and a First Kiss
episodes.overview: The day that Michaella has been waiting for is here! But after months of planning it’s a bittersweet moment for the Bates family, who realize she’ll soon be leaving home. There’s lots to do before 800 guests arrive to celebrate and see Michaella and Brandon say, ‘I do’ and finally share their first kiss.

episodes.name: Fly Fishin' Zip Linin' Honeymoon
episodes.overview: Michaella and Brandon travel to Montana for a romantic honeymoon exploring the great outdoors; Gil treats his youngest daughters to a dinner date; Zach comes home from the police academy for a home cooked meal with Whitney and Josie.

episodes.name: Training Wheels and Trick Saddles
episodes.overview: Judson turns five and gets a brand new bike for his birthday; Erin heads to Nashville to record a Christmas album; Lawson, Nathan, and Trace get a visit from a couple of The Dixie Stampede trick riders and learn some tricks of their own.

episodes.name: Windy City Newly Weds
episodes.overview: Kelly Jo and the kids travel to Chicago to visit newlyweds Michaella and Brandon and help them get settled in their new apartment, and see the sites in the Windy City; Zach graduates from the police academy.

episodes.name: Beaches, Boats and Bates
episodes.overview: It’s chaos at the Bates’ home as the gang packs up and heads to Florida for some fun in the sun. The family hits the beach to play, build sandcastles, and snorkel for the first time. The boys try their luck fishing for dinner, but not everyone is so sure about the catch of the day ending up on their plate.

episodes.name: Back Seat Bates
episodes.overview: It’s chaos at the Bates’ home as the gang packs up and heads to Florida for some fun in the sun. The family hits the beach to play, build sandcastles, and snorkel for the first time. The boys try their luck fishing for dinner, but not everyone is so sure about the catch of the day ending up on their plate.

episodes.name: Time to Renobate!
episodes.overview: With the three eldest sisters out of the house, the remaining girls decide it’s time to redecorate their bedroom. And Zach and Whitney are doing a little redecorating of their own as they head out to shop for a new couch to spruce up their home. Later the girls test out a new recipe for dinner.

episodes.name: Bringing Up Bradley
episodes.overview: Time is flying and the Bates’ first grandbaby, Bradley, is turning one! Kelly Jo and the girls look for gifts, but their outing goes overboard and quickly turns into a shopping spree. Lawson puts his best face forward at a photoshoot for his new album. Later, the family gathers for Bradley’s birthday party and Whitney shares a big announcement.

episodes.name: Love is in the Heir
episodes.overview: Whitney and Zach have their first ultrasound; Gil and Kelly celebrate their wedding anniversary with a romantic dinner; Nathan calls a family meeting to share some exciting news.

episodes.name: The Big Apple of Nathan's Eye
episodes.overview: A few of the Bates head to visit their friends, Ashley and Anastasia at the Big Apple; exploring Time Square and the Brooklyn Bridge.

episodes.name: Headed to the Altar
episodes.overview: The wedding of Brandon and Michaella is just days away; a look back at Brandon and Michaella's relationship and courtship, from their first days together to the romantic proposal.

episodes.name: Mother's Day
episodes.overview: When you have 19 Kids, Mother’s Day certainly takes on new meaning! This special highlights all the most motherly moments throughout the series from mom of 19 Kelly Jo, to the new moms Whitney, Erin and Alyssa! With new perspectives from the family, you’ll see why being a mom in the Bates family is such an important role!

episodes.name: From the Couch: Back Seat Bates
episodes.overview: The Bates are back to lend their colorful commentary to yet another memorable episode! Watch as they give real-time commentary and even let you in on what exactly was going through their minds when they visited the Police academy in Tennessee!

episodes.name: From the Couch: Organized Chaos
episodes.overview: The Bates are back to lend their colorful commentary to yet another memorable episode!

episodes.name: Summer Fun
episodes.overview: Just in time to kick off the summer, we’re re-living all the best Bates moments from summer! From playing kick-ball to lake trips to riding coasters at Dollywood, we’ll see how the Bates family loves to have fun in the summertime!

3.name: Season 3
3.overview: Bringing Up Bates is a reality series following Gil and Kelly Jo Bates, and their 19 kids, as they experience lifeâ€™s every day challenges and joys as a supersized family with an upcoming wedding, potential courtships and maybe even another baby on the way!

episodes.name: Big Family, Big Changes
episodes.overview: It’s a season of change for the Bates family with new loves, new careers, and a new grandbaby on the way!  But when Gil undergoes a serious medical procedure, it forces everyone to contemplate what the future holds for them all.

episodes.name: Bates Boys Birthday Bash
episodes.overview: It’s Trace and Jeb’s birthday and there’s only one rule: no girls allowed! The brothers, who share a birthday and a special bond, plan a party for Bates boys only complete with go carts and ice cream! Meanwhile, Erin and Chad travel to South Carolina to speak to and encourage a group of young girls about female empowerment.

episodes.name: A LOVEly Day
episodes.overview: The whole family arrives at the Bates house to celebrate their favorite holiday, ‘I Love You Day’ AND there’s someone new at the table – Tori’s new beau!  The family is happy to see Michaella and Alyssa return home, as well as Nathan’s girlfriend, Ashley, who arrives for the celebration to have a very important conversation with Kelly Jo and Gil.  Later, at the family’s celebration someone in the family makes a very special announcement!

episodes.name: Sunshine State Bates
episodes.overview: While Alyssa, John, and Allie Jane may live far from the rest of the family, they’re never far from their hearts!  We check in with the Webster’s in Florida to see what life is like for the family of three – from their family business to their favorite pastimes.  Meanwhile, expectant moms Erin and Whitney, get together with Kelly Jo to talk about all things baby girl!

episodes.name: Tough Decisions and Large Ambitions
episodes.overview: Change is afoot for all the Bates boys. Lawson travels to Nashville and makes exciting new plans for his music career, but when he shares his plans with the family, they worry he may have bitten off more than he can chew. Meanwhile, expectant couples, Zach and Whitney and Erin and Chad bond over their upcoming baby girls. And Nathan shares some unexpected news about his courtship.

episodes.name: The Big Chill
episodes.overview: It’s time to get cookin’!  The Bates family is reunited once again to perform at an event very dear to their hearts, the annual Volunteer Fire Department Chili Fundraiser.  As they wait for the married couples to arrive, Trace decides to get serious about his trick riding and enlists the help of Gil and Jackson to build a ring to practice in.  Later at the big event, the family gets nervous about their upcoming performance.  Without much time to practice, will they come up flat or be able to pull it together in time to hit a high note?

episodes.name: The Great Bates Clean-Up
episodes.overview: It’s that time of the year again and the Bates are ready to clean house!  With a big family, Spring cleaning is no easy feat.  Kelly Jo leads the project and tries to convince the kids to get rid of their old junk and used toys.  But when Gil gets sentimental he may make a mess of the whole endeavor.  And while the family is working hard at home, Chad is hard at work at his job at the metal yard.

episodes.name: Bloopers, Outtakes, And Mishaps, OH MY!
episodes.overview: With 19 kids you never know what what’s going to happen!  And as we’ve seen, the Bates kids are chock-full of hilarious sayings and entertaining moments.  We take a look back and highlight the funniest and wackiest things the Bates kids have said and done.

episodes.name: Birthdays and Boyfriends
episodes.overview: The Bates are back in Florida and are ready to party!  It’s the Bates girls’ turn this time to celebrate as Allie Jane and Carlin share a big birthday.  The family prepares for the birthday bash but quickly realize it’s a lot harder to plan a party for both a 1-year-old and an 18-year-old then they originally thought.  Then, Kelly Jo and Gil take advantage of their time in Florida when they decide to meet Tori’s boyfriend’s family.

episodes.name: Growing Paine
episodes.overview: Grandbaby Carson is turning one with a celebration; Erin hosts the party while Kelly Jo arrives with the party's entertainment.

episodes.name: Bates Dish it Out
episodes.overview: The family heads to an all you can eat buffet; Lawson works on his new album with inspiration from Emily Ann Roberts.

4.name: Season 4
4.overview: Bringing Up Bates is back, and buckle up because it will be one roller coaster of a summer! Change is in the air as a lot of the kids are beginning to forge their own paths outside of the family. From new loves, to new careers and new babies, the Bates are growing up and experiencing both the highs and lows of life.

episodes.name: Summer Lovin', Guitar Strummin and a Surprise a Comin'!
A Birthday and A Birdie
episodes.overview: Not only is the Bates brood growing, but they're all maturing and reaching new milestones! As the family comes together to celebrate Katie's turning 16, it's time for her to finally join in on the Bates girls' tradition of receiving a purity ring. With the entire family together, Kelly Jo and Gil get to share the good news that they've secured a new location for their congregation, Mama Jane gets to meet her new great-grandbabies for the first time, and Papa Bill, Gil and Lawson hit the links to see which Bates is the best golfer.

episodes.name: Doggy Dilemmas
episodes.overview: Erin and Chad certainly have their hands full with a newborn baby, a toddler, and their new furry addition, Max. Realizing they're in need of some assistance, they enlist the help of the little kids for some puppy training. In Chicago, it's almost been a year of wedded bliss for Michaela and Brandon, so we check on on the newlyweds and their life in Chicago. Meanwhile, the Bates make progress on their new basketball court and Lawson and Emily Ann come together to perform at the Children's Hospital.

episodes.name: Surprise! Kelly Jo's Big 5-0!
episodes.overview: It's a milestone birthday for the Bates matriarch and the family wants to make sure it's a birthday Kelly Jo will never forget! After months of planning, the time has finally come to honor Kelly Jo's 50th! To make sure the surprise stays in tact, Gil takes Kelly Jo on a romantic getaway to Chattanooga, TN, or so she thinks. Meanwhile, the Bates kids are scrambling behind the scenes to pull off this major clandestine event and surprise Kelly Jo with a Bates style celebration! Can they pull it off?

episodes.name: I 'Donut' Know What I'd Do Without You!
episodes.overview: Love is in the air! It's Tori and Bobby's ‘1 year' anniversary. To celebrate the occasion, Tori and the entire Bates family are headed to Florida to visit Bobby! Tori wants to share some fun in the sun with her boyfriend, but he's planned a bigger surprise for his leading lady. Is an ‘official courtship' on the horizon? In between putt putt, parasailing and beach time, Tori is left to ponder when Bobby will ‘pop' the big question!

episodes.name: Loads of Laundry and Lots of Lessons

5.name: Season 5
5.overview: It’s a time of “New Beginnings” for the Bates family as the entire crew takes on new and exciting challenges. Zach and Whitney are adjusting to life as parents of two, Erin and Chad are adjusting to a new baby and puppy, and Lawson launches his own concert tour. Meanwhile, Alyssa has exciting news to share and Tori sees her relationship with Bobby evolve into something more serious.

episodes.name: Summer of Love
episodes.overview: Love is blooming for the Bates, with Carlin finding a special friend in Evan and Tori and Bobby deepening their bond; the married couples have big news, especially Erin and Chad.

episodes.name: Road Trip Romance
episodes.overview: Carlin and Katie hit the road to spend some quality time with Carlin's Songwriting Suitor, Evan, and his family; Evan and the girls have some fun at an indoor skating park and the young couple work on a special song for Evan's family.

episodes.name: Bobby's Movin' In
episodes.overview: Bobby and Tori are making plans for the future! After he graduates from college, Bobby is hoping to move from Florida to Tennessee to be closer to Tori. Before he makes a final decision, he heads to Knoxville to interview for jobs and look for a place to live. And in an effort to add a little structure to Jud and Jeb’s roughhousing, Kelly Jo takes the boys to a martial arts class. Later, Bobby and Tori discuss their future timeline with Gil and Kelly Jo over dinner. Is an engagement on the horizon?

episodes.name: Sibling Revelry
episodes.overview: It’s Sister bonding time! Erin, Tori, Carlin, Whitney, Josie and Katie join together for a self defense class and engage in a little friendly competition! Meanwhile, Gil has many young Bates drivers behind the wheel, he gathers the kiddos for a ‘Car 101’ lesson. Later, it’s double date night for the married couples! Since Erin and Zach have a serious appreciation for cooking, they convince Whitney and Chad to join them for a cooking class!

episodes.name: He Said, She Shed
episodes.overview: Kelly Jo cashes in on her ‘I Love you Day’ gift from Gil and wants him to clean up the shed. Can Gil complete the project in a timely fashion and without any complaints? As the boys help Gil organize the shed, Nathan gets sidetracked and uses scrap items to make an impromptu zip line. Meanwhile, Carlin escapes clean up duty and opts to paint lines on the new Bates Basketball court! Later, Trace plays a pickup basketball game with a few college players. Will he be able to keep up and secure a spot on the team or will Lawson sabotage the game?

episodes.name: NEWLYWED EDITION
episodes.overview: On this special ‘Newlywed’ Episode of ‘Bringing Up Bates,’ we’ll see how well the younger Bates couples know their partners! Can they guess their spouse’s favorite meal? How about their dream vacation destination? Let’s hope they’ve been paying attention to each other over the years, otherwise things could get awkward!

episodes.name: Don't Worry, We've 'Goat' This!
episodes.overview: Erin and Chad have expanded their family with twin pygmy goats, but having extra ‘kids’ means more household chores. So Gil and the younger kids stop by to help Chad paint the goats’ new shed. Back at the Bates household, Nathan’s impromptu zip line wasn’t the safest, so Gil and the kids reconfigure a longer and much safer design. Once they settle on the perfect spot, the kids test it out! And later, Erin surprises Chad with a 30th Birthday Adventure with an escape to Hot Springs, NC for a romantic getaway without the kids.

episodes.name: Stop, Drop and Wash
episodes.overview: The Bates family will never forget their house fire, and so they organize a car-washing fundraiser to give back to the heroic volunteer firefighters who responded to their emergency situation. Right before the big day, Zach insists on giving the Bates kids a tutorial on the do’s and don’ts of properly washing a car. But will a family water fight put an end to Zach’s lesson? Meanwhile, Chad and Erin are interested in purchasing a ‘fixer upper’ house and begin the search for a property that they hope to renovate and call their own!

episodes.name: MORE Bloopers, Outtakes and Mishaps, Oh My!
episodes.overview: With 19 kids you never know what’s going to happen! And as we’ve seen, the Bates kids are chock-full of hilarious sayings and entertaining moments. Here’s a look back at some of the funniest and wackiest things the Bates kids have said and done, updated with even more fun clips and mishaps!

episodes.name: One Cap, Two Gowns?
episodes.overview: Bobby's big graduation party; a few rounds of disc golf; Bobby and Tori discuss their future together; Josie gets the chance to spend some time with Kelton.

episodes.name: The Night The Lights Went Out in Tennessee
episodes.overview: Now that Nathan is a certified flight instructor, he's moved back to Rocky Top, TN to teach flight lessons; Kacie Lynn is turning the big One; a power outage leads to an impromptu slumber party and game night.

episodes.name: The Fabulous Backwoods Bates Boys
episodes.overview: Zach organizes a camping trip in hopes of having some bonding moments with his brothers; Zach gets an unexpected call; Kelly Jo, Erin and Whitney gather up the younger kiddos for a swimming lesson.

6.name: Season 6
6.overview: How do parents with 19 kids aged 2 to 25 handle daily challenges? And how will the family change when grandkids are added to the mix!?

episodes.name: The 4 C’s: Carat, Clarity, Carlin & Courtship
episodes.overview: Love is in the air for the Bates Girls! But which daughter is next in line to tie the knot? And will Gil be able to “let go” of his not so little girls? Now that Evan has the green light to officially court Carlin, he puts his “courtship proposal” plan in motion. Will Carlin get “clued in” to Evan’s big surprise for her? And before Bobby moves to TN, he makes a pitstop at a jewelry store in Florida. Meanwhile, it’s a milestone Birthday for Josie. She’s turning 18 and the entire Bates family, including Alyssa and Michaella, are in TN for her surprise party! Will suitor Kelton be on hand when she makes a wish? And later, the Bates have their first official church service in their new congregation space!

episodes.name: Decorating Dilemmas and Job Decisions
episodes.overview: Michaella and Brandon have moved out of their tiny one bedroom apartment and into a new rental house, so Kelly Jo and Erin pay the young couple a visit and lend a hand with decorating their new space. But will the ladies be able to to settle on a design style that will appease Michaella AND Brandon? Back in Rocky Top, Chad’s decided to leave his job at the scrapyard and has offered up his position to Bobby. But after spending the day shadowing Chad at work, will Bobby be the right fit for the position? After work, Bobby meets up with Tori for an ice cream date and to discuss their future together. And back in Chicago, Kelly Jo, Erin, Michaela and Brandon hit up a bowling alley and engage in some friendly competition!

episodes.name: Bobby's Happy Camper
episodes.overview: Bobby’s finally making the big move to Rocky Top so he can be closer to Tori. Before he touches down in TN, he stops by a Florida jewelry store to pick up Tori’s engagement ring. But when will Bobby actually “pop the question” to his true love? Meanwhile, Tori and a few of her siblings attempt to cozy up the camper before Bobby moves in, but will plumbing issues put a damper on his move in date? And later, Bobby’s parents visit the Bates family home for the very first time.

episodes.name: SUN Day, Fun Day!
episodes.overview: A Total Eclipse is headed directly over Rocky Top, TN! So before the big event, Brandon gives the Bates kids an interactive science lesson, demonstrating how the moon blocks the sun during an eclipse. And later, the Bates family gather together at a pool party for some fun in the sun and to marvel at the dark sky above, caused by the Eclipse. And before Michaella and Brandon head back home to Chicago, they meet up with Dr. Vick for a consultation, as they continue to search for answers about their infertility struggles.

episodes.name: Erin’s Surprise Takes the Cake!
episodes.overview: It’s a sweet surprise, as Erin reveals to her husband Chad some very unexpected news. And later, Whitney balances motherhood, with her new career as a Realtor. At the office, Whitney gets advice from her new boss and walks away with a parting gift that puts a smile on her face! Back at the Bates House, Trace practices basketball drills with his college buddies. But will a negative attitude halt his chances of making a spot on the college basketball team? Meanwhile, Erin bakes a cake with her younger sisters and lets them in on a secret! How will the girls react when they realize they’re the first Bates family members to know some very big news?

episodes.name: The Best is Yet to Come
episodes.overview: It’s been love at first sight for Tori and Bobby, but ever since Bobby moved to TN, Tori has been eager for him to “pop the question!” While an engagement ring might be burning a hole in Bobby’s pocket, he still needs to come up with the perfect proposal plan, so he turns to Gil and Kelly Jo for advice. And later, when Bobby, Kelton and Evan take their leading ladies out on a special triple date, will the romantic setting inspire Bobby to get down on one knee? Or will he come up with an even bigger surprise moment to ask for Tori’s hand in marriage?

episodes.name: Bates Sports Special
episodes.overview: It’s the thrill of victory and the agony of defeat in this episode which highlights the best Bates sports moments. Whether on land, sea or snow, see the Bates as they hit, shoot, tackle, score, wipe-out and take the prize in this compilation of their best (and worst) athletic achievements.

episodes.name: Fan Favorite Clips
episodes.overview: We’re counting down the Top 25 Most Viewed Bates Clips from UPtv.com that have never before been seen on TV! Will your favorite clip make the list?

episodes.name: Save the Date and Decisions to Make!
episodes.overview: Now that Tori and Bobby are officially engaged, they’re hoping they can move up their wedding date, but can they convince Gil and Kelly Jo that this is a wise decision? And later, the Bates brothers head out for Nathan’s annual “guys only” lake Birthday party, where they hit the water for some fun in the sun! Meanwhile, Kelly Jo and Tori are in full wedding planning mode and first priority is finding Tori a wedding dress! After a consultation with a wedding dress designer, will Tori be convinced that a customized dress is the best fit for her plans?

episodes.name: Icing on the Cakes
episodes.overview: Kelly Jo has assembled a wedding planning team for Tori and Bobby’s nuptials and now it’s time to scout the venue! While Tori desires a winter wonderland themed wedding, will her indecision on the details prevent Kelly Jo from checking things off her To Do List? Meanwhile, Lawson, Nathan and Trace spend some time at the ranch, catching up and riding horses. And later, Isaiah celebrates his 13th Birthday with an epic laser-tag Battle in the Bates’ Backyard. Always a competition, will the Birthday boy end up on the winning team?

episodes.name: Big Decision, Bigger Opinions
episodes.overview: Before Kelly Jo and the girls head to Kentucky for Tori’s wedding dress fitting, the entire family, including Michaella and Alyssa, gather for a festive family picnic! But when Gil discovers some mysterious envelopes, the topic of conversation turns to which sibling might have some surprise news? And later, Kelly Jo, Tori and her sisters meet up at Renee’s Bridal shop to try on customized bridesmaid and wedding dresses. But having several sisters means hearing several different opinions. After trying on three distinct wedding dress styles, will Tori find her dream dress or will her indecisiveness get the best of her?

episodes.name: Fixin’ for New Beginnings
episodes.overview: The Bates and Paines are ready to renovate! Now that Chad’s started a new job as a Subcontractor, he’s been assigned to work on a “Fixer Upper.” Can he impress his boss with his skills? And will Erin’s interior decorating input help with “flipping” the property? Meanwhile, Zach and Whitney have made the decision to buy a home that needs some work. After closing on a property, the renovation adventures begin! But juggling two toddlers, hectic work schedules and a home improvement project have them working overtime. Will this dream project turn disastrous?

episodes.name: Can You Have a Wedding Shower Without the Bride & Groom?
episodes.overview: Before Tori “Ties the Knot” to Bobby, Gil takes her out for special father/daughter outing. Will Gil be able to hold back the tears, as they take a walk down memory lane? Meanwhile, now that Josie is working toward her Cosmetology license, Whitney takes Kaci Lynn to her aunt for her very first hair cut! Later, Michaella and Brandon meet up with Erin and Whitney to help decorate for Tori and Bobby’s wedding shower. But as a crowd gathers for the festivities, there’s no sign of Tori and Bobby. Will this be a Bride and Groom-less shower?

episodes.name: Beach Blanket Bachelorette!
episodes.overview: Now that Tori has a ring on her finger, Kelly Jo and her sisters have planned a Bachelorette Beach getaway for the Bride to Be! After arriving in Florida, the ladies head out for some fun in the sun and girl talk! Will Tori be “all ears” when her married sisters give her some advice on what to expect when she starts a new life with Bobby? Back in Tennessee, Bobby recruits some of the younger Bates boys to help him move out of the camper and into a new apartment. And later, it’s Go-Kart racing time! With the girls away, Gil, Bobby, Kelton, Lawson and Nathan decide to have a little fun of their own at an indoor speedway. As the competition heats up, things get out of control!

episodes.name: Another Beautiful Season of Blessings
episodes.overview: The Bates head to South Carolina for their annual Thanksgiving tradition with Papa Bill and Mama Jane, and even Carlin and Josie’s boyfriends are on hand for the festivities on the farm! Now that Evan and Carlin are officially courting, will Josie and Kelton gather the courage to ask Gil and Kelly Jo’s permission to “officially court” during the trip? Meanwhile, Papa Bill recruits all the young men to help him finish building a barn, and Mama Jane enlists the help of Kelly Jo, Alyssa, Whitney, Carlin and the kids to help pick pecans and bake brownies. And Thanksgiving wouldn’t be complete without Mama Jane’s home cooked supper, where the family gathers around the table and gives thanks.

episodes.name: Countdown to ‘I Do’
episodes.overview: The Countdown has begun! Before Tori and Bobby say, “I Do,” there’s a million things left to do! Tori has her final wedding dress fitting and she sits down with Carlin to come up with a hairstyle for her special day! Meanwhile, Gil, Nathan, and the middle boys get to work on cutting and trimming trees for Tori and Bobby’s “winter wonderland” wedding decor. Will the boys’ lack of progress put Kelly Jo in a panic? Meanwhile, with Baby #3 on the way, the Paines take a family trip to the Doctor for Erin’s ultrasound. Last, in honor of their 30th anniversary, Gil and Kelly Jo have a memorable date night and attend Lawson’s Charity Christmas concert. But when Nathan jumps up on stage unannounced, the family’s in for an unexpected surprise!

episodes.name: Tori’s Winter Wonderland Wedding
episodes.overview: It’s a very “Marry” Christmas for the Bates as Tori and Bobby’s wedding day is here! The family hustles to take care of last minute “Winter Wonderland” wedding decorations, Tori and Bobby begin to prep for their California honeymoon, and the rehearsal dinner the night before becomes a bit chaotic when you have a bridal party this large! When the big day finally arrives, everyone is full of emotion, especially Gil as he prepares to give another daughter away. And once the vows are exchanged, it’s time for the couple’s first kiss! Will it be everything they’ve been waiting for? And with any Bates wedding, you have to wonder, who’s next?

episodes.name: The Bates Get Candid
episodes.overview: In this new special, hear from the Bates family as they speak for the first time about their experience shooting the show. They’ll look back and reflect on seven seasons, share funny stories from “Behind the Scenes” and discuss how being on TV has impacted their lives and those of others.

episodes.name: Mother’s Day Special – UPdated!
episodes.overview: This year, Mother’s Day with the Bates is a whole lot bigger and a whole lot more fun! Join the family for the most motherly moments throughout the series as we celebrate some of favorite moms; Kelly Jo, Whitney, Erin and Alyssa; updated with new content!

episodes.name: The Bates Royal Wedding Celebration!
episodes.overview: With 5 weddings under their belt, if the Bates know one thing, it’s weddings! See all the great moments of weddings past – including never before seen footage – from proposals to rings to dresses, and that great moment when they say, “I Do!”

episodes.name: A Heavenly Honeymoon & A Courtship Countdown!
episodes.overview: After a picture-perfect wedding ceremony, Tori and Bobby head out for their Honeymoon. Upon arriving in California, the newlyweds take a romantic drive along the Pacific Coast Highway and set sail for a picturesque boat ride on the Monterey Bay. But after Tori has a video chat with her Mom and Dad, will she feel homesick for TN? Meanwhile, the courtship countdown is on! Now that Gil and Kelly Jo have granted Kelton permission to officially ask Josie to Court, he begins to put his plan in motion. After taking Josie on a scenic tram ride and ice skating adventure in Gatlinburg, TN, will Kelton finally take a leap of faith and ask her the “Big Question?” And later, Tori and Bobby continue their Honeymoon adventures in Yosemite National Park.

episodes.name: Eye Love You Day!
episodes.overview: Tori and Bobby’s wedding might be behind them, but Kelly Jo isn’t slowing down! She’s finally getting eye surgery to correct her vision. But how will the Bates household hold up while she’s in recovery mode? Meanwhile, tis the season for love, as the family preps for this year’s “I Love You Day” festivities. Will the “growing old together” theme lead to some unexpected costumes? And will the single Bates boys finally secure a seat at the table for the couples’ dinner?

episodes.name: Seas the Day!
episodes.overview: Now that many of the older Bates girls have moved out of the house, it’s Carlin’s turn to take on new household responsibilities, including tutoring her younger siblings. But how will the Bates kids respond to Carlin’s new rules? Later, Gil and the family head to Myrtle Beach, SC so the kids can meet Mama Jane’s side of the family for the first time. The adventure begins with lunch at a seafood restaurant, but can he convince the Bates kids to try seafood for the very first time? And despite the cold weather, the family enjoys some bonding time on the beach, including a morning exercise stroll with Mama Jane and her sisters and some football time on the sand. But during the game, will Carlin lure Evan away from the guys, to pose for some “engagement worthy” photos?

episodes.name: Hit the Road Jack!
episodes.overview:
To celebrate his “Sweet 16,” Jackson heads to the DMV to take his Driver’s Test. But will he walk out with a license in hand? Meanwhile, Erin and Chad Paine prepare for the arrival of Baby #3, Everly Hope. As they decorate the baby’s room, they discuss their growing family.

And now that Jackson’s becoming a young adult, he meets up with his big brother Zach for advice on his future. And later, Trace gets a flying lesson from his brother Nathan. But before he jumps in the cockpit, will the nerves get the best of him?

episodes.name: Lions, and Tigers, and Bates, Oh My!
episodes.overview: Now that Michaella and Brandon have more spacious digs, it’s Addee, Ellie and Callie’s turn to visit their big sis in Chicago! Michaella gives the girls their first sewing lesson and they enjoy some bonding time while painting ceramics at a pottery studio and visiting one of Michaela’s favorite places in Chicago – the zoo. Meanwhile back home, Gil spends some quality time with Jud and Jeb by making a seesaw, while Tori and Bobby ponder their upcoming move to Nashville with mixed emotions.

episodes.name: Just a Little Off the Top, Please…
episodes.overview: Now that Josie’s graduated from cosmetology school, she’s landed a new job at a salon. But when Trace stops by for a trim, will his attention to detail put Josie’s skills to the test? Meanwhile Tori and Bobby meet up with Gil and Kelly Jo to discuss their plans to move to Nashville. And before baby Everly is born, Erin and Chad spend some bonding time with Carson and Brooklyn. Later, Zach and Gil attempt to make a handmade shuffle board game at the Bates house, but when the rest of the family decides to play wiffle ball, will another Bates project go uncompleted?

episodes.name: One Week, Three Babies?!
episodes.overview: It’s a busy week at the Bates’! Gil and Kelly Jo are gearing up to be on hand for the birth of Erin and Alyssa’s third child, while Lawson and Trace are busy preparing for their upcoming rodeo performance. But will a trick riding practice session at the family ranch cause Trace to have reservations about performing in front of a crowd? Meanwhile, Jackson helps Chad with a construction project at Noble Metals. And later, the Bates family gathers for supper at Zach and Whitney’s new house. But when it comes time to say the blessing, Tori and Bobby surprise the family with some very big news!

episodes.name: A Bundle of Joy and a Rodeo Show
episodes.overview: The Baby delivery countdown is on! KJ heads to Florida to be by Alyssa’s side on her due date, but will Erin or Alyssa deliver first? Meanwhile, Lawson and Trace head to Indiana to participate in their first ever Rodeo Variety show performance and demonstrate their trick riding skills while engaging in some brotherly competition.

episodes.name: Labor Paines
episodes.overview: Now that Alyssa’s given birth to her third child, Erin’s up next! Before her big due date, the Bates sisters treat her to a pedicure, but when Chad stops by for a visit, will he succumb to his own mani/pedi experience? And later, Erin’s strong contractions have Chad rushing to the hospital, but will they make it in time? And if they do, will Dr. Vick be ready?

7.name: Season 7
7.overview: How do parents with 19 kids aged 2 to 25 handle daily challenges? And how will the family change when grandkids are added to the mix!?

episodes.name: Ready or Not, Baby Kade Is on His Way!
episodes.overview: To celebrate Zach's birthday, the guys hit the road for some fun in the mud; between four wheeling and skeet shooting, Gil gets news that baby Kade is on his way; Kelly Jo and Bobby are by Tori's side, but the rest may not make it in time.

episodes.name: It's a Boy & Maybe One More?
episodes.overview: It’s a mad rush as Gil, Erin, Carlin, and Lawson attempt to make it to the hospital before Tori gives birth to baby Kade. After having contractions all day, Tori is ready to push! Bobby comforts Tori through her delivery and the couple shares an emotional moment together when baby Kade touches Tori’s face for the first time. After several weeks have passed, the entire family gathers at the Bates house so everyone can finally meet Baby Kade in person and celebrate the Christmas holiday. During the festivities, Gil has an unexpected surprise for the family…but Josie has an even bigger surprise in store for her parents!

episodes.name: A Very Medieval I Love You Day!
episodes.overview: For I Love You Day, the Bates crew gathers for an elaborate chivalry-themed party with food, games and costumes; Kelly Jo and the girls decorate for the party and get caught up on all the family news, such as Carlin and Evan's wedding plans..

episodes.name: A Blushing Bride to Be!
episodes.overview: Kelly Jo, Erin and Carlin head to Nashville, Tenn., to find a wedding dress for Carlin; they spend time with Tori, Baby Kade and Lawson; the group takes a trip to TopGolf, where Erin and Lawson enjoy some friendly sibling competition.

episodes.name: A Blushing Bride to Be!
episodes.overview: Kelly Jo, Erin and Carlin head to Nashville, Tenn., to find a wedding dress for Carlin; they spend time with Tori, Baby Kade and Lawson; the group takes a trip to TopGolf, where Erin and Lawson enjoy some friendly sibling competition.

episodes.name: A Baby Grand Plan!
episodes.overview: Carlin needs to start nailing down all the wedding details; her wedding dress arrives but needs major alterations; Tori and Bobby's moving truck is no match for all of their belongings; lucky for them, Gil is a master packer.

episodes.name: Episode 20
episodes.overview: Erin and Chad team up and combine skills to work on a project; Erin renovates a baby room for a new client; Kelton gets a glimpse into his future while spending some time with Bobby and baby Kade; Katie works on her pilot's license

episodes.name: New Beginnings
episodes.overview: Erin, Whitney and Carlin team up to start an online store selling dresses; Kelly Jo takes Addee, Ellie and Callie to an adventure park; the family throws Carlin and Evan a wedding shower that turns emotional as the bride gets advice from everyone.

episodes.name: Baby Mamas and Bridesmaids Drama
episodes.overview: Whitney and Zach are ready to share some happy news with the rest of the family - they have baby number three on the way; Carlin hits a big milestone before her wedding: college graduation.

episodes.name: Home is Where the Heart Is!
episodes.overview: As their wedding day gets closer and closer, Carlin and Evan get busy fixing up their future home; now that Michaella and Brandon have moved back to Tennessee, the eldest Bates daughter is anxious to settle into her new house.

episodes.name: A Wedding Worth the Wait
episodes.overview: Carlin's fairytale wedding is just days away; emotions are running high and the clock is ticking; with her bridesmaids by her side, Carlin gets ready to walk down the aisle.

8.name: Season 8
8.overview: When Gil and Kelly Jo Bates married in 1987, they didn't plan to parent 19 children. Ranging from toddler to 20-something, living under one roof, challenges abound, even for this tight-knit family.

episodes.name: A Busy Business and a Baby Bombshell
Nesting Mode & Mommies on a Mission!
Taking Care of Business & Florida Fun
Brandon's Book and Kelly Jo's New Look
Holiday Cheer and New Baby Khloe is Here!
Roaring Bates and Pending Due Dates
A Double Date & Something to Celebrate!

9.name: Season 9
9.overview: How do parents with 19 kids aged 2 to 25 handle daily challenges? And how will the family change when grandkids are added to the mix!?

episodes.name: Six Years and Nine Seasons Later
episodes.overview: Join us in celebrating six years and nine seasons of laughs, loves, and family.

episodes.name: New Horizons
episodes.overview: Spring is a time of new life and hope... and for the growing Bates brood it’s no different. In this special we’ll see the new ventures, new love and celebratory moments that keep the Bates flourishing.

episodes.name: He or She, What Will the Baby Be?
episodes.overview: Josie’s business is thriving, but she and Kelton deal with heartbreak after a miscarriage. Now that Michaella’s almost a nurse, Kelly Jo leans on her for advice about her health.

episodes.name: Smitten in the Smoky Mountains
episodes.overview: The Bates Sisters’ Boutique purchases a storefront! Later a group heads to the Smoky Mountains for some outdoor birthday fun, but will a gem mining adventure reveal a surprise proposal?

episodes.name: Nathan’s New Romance and a Secret Birthday Bash
episodes.overview: To show her love on the eve of her surgery, the Bates kids throw Kelly Jo a surprise party!

episodes.name: ‘Tis the Season for Surprises
episodes.overview: Nathan invites his girlfriend for Christmas, and Katie dishes about her future with Travis.

episodes.name: More Moms, More Babies, More Celebrating!
episodes.overview: Never before seen footage and tender moments with the newest moms and the latest babies

episodes.name: Home Sweet Home & Nathan’s Love!
episodes.overview: The Bates Sisters Boutique has a new workspace in downtown Rocky Top!

episodes.name: A DIY Date and a Delivery Day
episodes.overview: Alyssa and John welcome Macy Jo into the world as proud grandparents Gil and Kelly Jo are on hand to meet grandbaby # 15! Later, Katie puts her makeup skills to the test on a bridal photo shoot.

episodes.name: Lawson’s New Love and the Boutique’s New Digs!
episodes.overview: Now that Erin’s health is on the upswing, the Paines tackle renovating an old camper! Meanwhile, Whitney, Erin and Carlin move out of their old workspace and into their new downtown location!

episodes.name: Two By Two, I Love You
episodes.overview: Bates Sisters Boutique holds their first photo shoot in their new space, and Nathan and Esther shop for engagement rings. Finally, the family gathers two by two for their most beloved holiday!

episodes.name: The Webster’s New Home & Nathan’s Next Move
episodes.overview: Tori and Whitney meet up to swap baby clothes while their hubbies are in charge of cooking dinner! Later, Nathan returns to the jewelry store to purchase Esther's dream engagement ring.

episodes.name: Never Before Seen on TV! - Summertime Special
episodes.overview: Savor the Summer season with never before seen moments along with some summertime classics as the Bates enjoy everything from whitewater rafting, camping, shuffleboard, cookouts and more!

episodes.name: Due Dates & An Engagement Getaway!
episodes.overview: Whitney and Josie dish about motherhood and work on a craft project for their nurseries. Meanwhile, Nathan tells Lawson that he’s hoping to propose to Esther!

10.name: Season 10
10.overview: The married couples continue to grow their families, and Katie and Travis may be headed for a big step. But this season is not just about the girls… will a Bates boy finally be headed to the altar?
